inclusion.criterion: clinical symptoms of type 2 diabetes between 6 months to 10 years of disease, according to the diagnostic criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diabetes mellitus type 2 between 6 months to 10 years of disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Body mass index between 25 and 35 kg/m2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Fasting glucose between 120 and 250 mg / dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Glycated Hb A1c greater than 7,5 % and taking metformin (dose above 1700 mg / day), with or without other secretagogue
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Male or female (not pregnant), who present clinical symptoms of type 2 diabetes between 6 months to 10 years of disease, according to the diagnostic criteria.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: T2DM with chronic complications that already have clinical consequences, serum creatinine greater than 1.5 mg/dl, history of heart disease and severe concomitant diseases such as liver, coronary artery, renal, with severe psychiatric or neurological disorders.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of abuse of alcohol and / or illegal drugs or psychotropic medicines in the past six months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensitivity to any of the components of the of study drug formulation.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with DM1, DM2 using insulin and other types of diabetes
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago. He presents to the clinic with shortness of breath and fatigue during activities.
